Hello there! I'm Swart, a french 26 years old fursuit maker from France. You may also know me under my digital artist alias, Swarthylacine! My pronouns are she/they. 

I'm delighted to be back at this year's edition of EF and to have the opportunity to meet you :D

In business since 2018, my favorite suits to make are... well, any of them! My art and fursuit style gravitates towards toony/anime and my focus is on quality and diversity.
My mascot is Nigiri, a sushi-inspired husky/corgi mix who you may see running around at the con!
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
At my table, you'll find:

SMALL MERCH
~~ Pin-back buttons
~~ Weatherproof stickers

Post-convention completion (2-6 weeks turnaround time)

I'm a proud member of the LGBTQIA+ community, as I'm trans male, demisexual and live in a poly relationship.

ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtistText: Hey i'm a freelance illustrator, with a bachelors in animation. Been drawing creatures since I was young and as such figured I started properly bringing them to life! The stories behind characters is what truly hooks me, and I wish to create emotional and relatable stories, despite their wild fantasy settings.
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
A wide variety of prints and stickers of creatures, monsters, anthros and co!
I will also be taking some sketch commissions during the con!

ChangedEntities.Merchandise: Fursuits, parts and fursuit attributes
ChangedEntities.ShortDescription:
Fursuit parts, partials and fursuit bandana's.
Come check us out and see what we can do!
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtistText:
We are Mixed Monsters, fursuit makers from the Netherlands.
We have had a huge love for fursuits ever since we joined the fandom. Since we didn't have money to buy one we decided to make our own and that's how this journey began.

We are especially passionate about fursuits that stand out in the big fluffy crowd one way or another. And between all the dogs and foxes we greatly enjoy seeing the more uncommon critters popping up. It's those kind of fursuits that drive and inspire us to make more then just costumes, we want to make art that gets noticed and appreciated. Whether that is because of the interesting patterns or because of it's species. 
Fursuits that are different and stand out.
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
Looking for a brand new partial??
We got some precious beans waiting to be adopted! (Partials include character and mini ref)
We also got bandana's to finish that adorable look for your character.
Or you prefer to just wear some handpaws and a tail during the con? If you get both you'll get a discount for the set!!

ChangedEntities.ShortDescription:
I am a freelance comic artist and illustrator from Italy, specializing in semi-realistic feral and anthro art. Currently working on my self-published comic book "Africa".
Cats rule!
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtistText:
I've loved drawing animals ever since I was a child, but life took me in a different direction for a while. I obtained a degree in Pharmacy and worked in the field for a few years, but was really unhappy.
Thanks to the support I received online, and especially by the furry community, I had the chance to switch career paths and become an artist full time. It worked wonderfully, and today I write and publish my own comics and create animal and furry-themed illustrations for companies and private clients alike.
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
All the merchandise available at my table!

COMIC:
"Africa" is the story of a young leopard mother whose purpose is to raise her two beloved cubs to adulthood. A look at modern family as seen through the eyes of African animals. Bundle available - discounted price for purchasing all three chapters together!

MERCH:
*** Hybrid animal stickers - mini series featuring funny, cute and cool hybrids of two animals. Collect them all!
*** Furry-themed t-shirts, all sizes available, various animal designs and colors.
*** A4 and postcard-sized prints of my art, featuring various animal designs and subjects, ranging from fantasy to abstract, to realistic.

COMMISSIONS: 
*** Traditional commissions are available, both black&white and colored sketches. Done in watercolor and ink, one to two characters max. VERY FEW SLOTS to be completed during the convention, available to ship any commissions ordered after the slot cap.

*** On top of being available for traditional commissions during the convention, my digital commissions will also have a 15% DISCOUNT when ordered during convention days - feel free to ask for a quote! *NOTE: Digital commissions will be started AFTER the convention has ended, and delivered in the weeks following EF.
ChangedEntities.ArtPreviewCaption: A selection of some of my artworks, which will be available as prints, stickers, t-shirts, and more!

Hello! I'm Avanii, a professional plush artist from the Netherlands. Creating plushies is my biggest pride and joy, closely followed by seeing them get adopted into loving new homes. From realistic animals to toony characters, it's all just so much fun to bring them to life! 

I have great fondness for all sorts of mammals, though ferrets, foxes and rats are especially dear and feature often in my work. I also love nature (especially mushrooms), monsters, horror, and fantasy, and draw inspiration from these themes for my art. 

I do not speak German very well, but will try my best!
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText: I primarily focus on handmade plushies. This edition I will have realistic foxes, wolves, hyenas and martens with me (only 2 of each species), and I'll have smaller plushies of various designs. If you like ferrets or kitsune you should definitely have a look :D I also have many nature-themed embroidered patches, cute plushie charms, acrylic and wooden keychains, enamel pins featuring wolves and cats, vinyl stickers, and more! Depending on how busy the selling gets, I'd love to also accept a few sketch commissions of your characters.

ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtistText: I'm a journeyman goldsmith based in Sweden. For 10 years I've studied and worked with jewelry made of precious metals. It's one of my biggest passions in life. Dragons are another one of those, and combining both of those things I end up doing something I really love. Jewelry with dragon themes.
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
I work and create jewelry out of precious metals. I make all my jewelry in my own workshop that I've funded and expanded over the years.

All pieces I have on display are crafted with traditional methods.
As in sawing out basic shapes out of silver metal sheets, filing them, hard-soldering things together, polishing.
Check my website for commission information.
https://draakae.crd.co

ChangedEntities.ShortDescription: I'm a color-loving German illustrator of real and imaginary creatures and an advocate of all animals. I’m the creator of the recently launched webcomic Being Monsters. I'll bring prints and books to EF, and I'll also be taking a very limited number of commissions.
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtistText: I'm a German freelance illustrator and usually run under my full name Julia Beutling. Iove colour, I depict real and imaginary creatures, and I’m an advocate of all animals. Since I launched my webcomic Being Monsters at the end of 2021, I can now officially call myself a comic creator, as well. I also made a number of personal illustrated books and poster series throughout the years.
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
Art: 
My illustrations show my partiality for nature and real animals, but I really enjoy taking trips into the realm of fairy tales and myths to return with a horde of mermaids, unicorns or talking monsters.

Comic: 
My ongoing, long-format webcomic Being Monsters is a modern, very free adaption of the classic fairy tale of Beauty and the Beast, in which a spiky young activist has to deal with an actual terrifying Monster, a conservative little village and her messed-up live in parallel. It’s much more a drama and a detective story than a romance.
You can read it for free on www.beingmonsters.com or on Webtoon.

At EF: 
I’ll bring my illustration series and books to the Dealer’s Den again (Junicorn, Tiny Inklings, Morph, etc.), and I'll have a few originals in the art show. I’ll also be taking a very limited number of my rare commissions at EF, so be quick if you want one!
ChangedEntities.ArtPreviewCaption: one part of the Morph series

ChangedEntities.Merchandise: 3d printed Keychains, stickers, original artworks, prints, traditional commissions on the spot, as well as digital commissions to be delivered after the con.
ChangedEntities.ShortDescription:
Italian feline loving artist and freelancing illustrator, ameteur animator, 3d printing and modeling enthusiast.
Nonbinary Assigned male at birth, she/her
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtistText:
Born in the year 2002 in the city of Rome, Italy, i grew up being told i was dysgraphic and having to use a computer for most schoolwork, however ever since finding the fandom, i was inspired to begin creating and drawing despite my condition. here i am now, six years since i started drawing, with a long road ahead, but a lot of accomplishments from the past years

Now, at the age of 20, i have two roads ahead of me, university or work. Either way i will continue working as a freelancer in art on the side, however, it is my dream and hope for my future to make this my full time job
I look forward to all of the challenges that working as an artist full time may bring, as well as improving my skills continuously as time passes, I’ll do my best to partecipate in as many cons as I can to share my art and keep making it for the awesome community that got me started in the first place.

I mostly draw Felines, but i love all species, I've even got 9 characters of my own, both anthro and feral!
i work with all kinds of media, pencils, watercolors, gouache paints and more, i love mixing and matching them from piece to piece, and of course Digital.
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
At the dealer's den you'll find:

---3d printed Key-chains---
i offer two designs of key-chains: Feline and canine paw-print
the feline design i modeled personally from 0, the Canine was made by b2vn on thingiverse, and I'm selling it with their permission
Every single key-chain was 3d printed,sanded and assembled by me. They’re available in two materials and 6 Colors

---Stickers---
Several designs available: Synth beeping, lazy kitten, three different 

The lazy cat and synth designs are available in 5x5cm holographic stickers
Every design is available in matte 8x5cm stickers, printed and cut by me

--Art prints--
Prints of most of the art found in my art-book are going to be available in three sizes: 15x10, A5 and A4, on gloss and satin photo paper

--Originals--
I will bring to the den some traditional art I made beforehand, available for purchase, all done on high quality 300gr watercolor paper, mixed media used on each.

--Commissions--

I will be offering both digital art reservation and traditional commissions, in limited number. A limited amount of traditional commissions will be completed and delivered on the spot, the rest will be shipped post con. Shipping expenses must be covered by the client.

*note: Digital commissions will get worked on AFTER the con has finished

ChangedEntities.Merchandise: Fursuits, Sewing templates, Fursuit props and accessories
ChangedEntities.ShortDescription: Premade fursuit partial, Sewing templates, Fursuit collars with cute tags and Fursuiting essentials!
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtistText:
Hello there!
The name is Unity, I'm a 26 year old Danish fursuit maker!
I've been making fursuits since 2013 that started out by a simple YouTube video back in 2011.
But after years of carving foam, inhaling airbrushing fumes, hot glue burns and being chronically covered in fur from top to toe I've made my fursuit making business my full time job in 2018.

Besides fursuit making I make: Collars, Bandanas, fursuit props, Fursuit essentials and my own sewing templates!
ChangedEntities.AboutTheArtText:
-Sewing template-
You wanna master making unique hand paws? 
Then come check out my homemade sewing templates! I offer a few different kinds:
-Feral style hand paws (both feline and canine)
-4 fingered poofy paws
-Sergal/dragon style paws
-5 fingered poofy paws
All of them will have finished examples presented so you can touch and visualize how your very own project will look like. 

-Premade fursuit partial-
This year I'll be brining a brand new and never used brown hyena fursuit!

-Fursuit accessories-
I love making fursuit sized collars with colorful printed fabric. They also come with cute resin printed tags that has been hand painted.

-Fursuiting essentials- 
Homemade balaclavas made with beautiful printed jersey fabrics.

ChangedEntities.Author: Eurofurence
ChangedEntities.Title: Welcome aboard, sailor- you're here early!
ChangedEntities.Content:
We're still loading up the ship and are not _quite_ ready to depart just yet, but please make yourself comfortable, we're about to set sail soon enough.

If you're using this on an **Android device**: Things may look a bit different than they used to in the past. We have rewritten the Android version of our apps from scratch, and while they should be functional, they may not be as polished as they used to be - yet.

We're still actively working on our apps, even that close to the convention start, so in order to have the best possible experience, please make sure you install any updates that the App Store / Play Store offers you.

If you have any questions regarding our mobile apps or would like to provide feedback, please do so via our [Telegram Channel](https://t.me/+nzwD387IdnI2NGY0)
